trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Greer
There were no other sightings in Greer on or around October 11th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAt home unloading groceries just at twilight, stars just appearing. I noticed a very bright light, at first thought it was Venus, but noticed the movement. At first thought maybe a high altitude commercial jet with headlights on. Noticed after a few minutes the light was much more "white" than the normal headlights, and the light never dimmed even after traveling across the entire sky that I could see. Perspective of the object changed, but the light never blinked, dimmed or changed in any way until the object went over the NE horizon and out of sight.
Summary: Very Bright, Venus like. Moving steadily, light never changed.
